participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Analytical and nurturing, she enjoys solving mysteries and caring for her pets.
participant_1.background: I like to read true crime novels. I have two dogs. I work as a secretary at an insurance agency. I am close to both of my brothers. I travel every year to Disney World.

participant_2.name: Mike Thompson
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, he enjoys indulging in treats and has a love for classic movies.
participant_2.background: I like candy and soda. I am not healthy. I weigh 300 pounds. I like the movie Godfather. I am a man.
